item.title: Chain Games Partners with Centralex Announcing Token Listing and Airdrop of CENX Tokens to Existing CHAIN Stakers
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
Tallinn, Estonia– (Chain Games OU. – May 14th, 2021) –  Chain Games, OU, a blockchain gaming and Esports company, is pleased to announce a partnership with Centralex Exchange, resulting in a token listing of the Company’s CHAIN gaming token, as well as an airdrop of CENX tokens to all existing CHAIN stakers.    With the Centralex […]

The post Chain Games Partners with Centralex Announcing Token Listing and Airdrop of CENX Tokens to Existing CHAIN Stakers first appeared on Chain Games.
item.content:encoded:
Tallinn, Estonia– (Chain Games OU. – May 14th, 2021) –  Chain Games, OU, a blockchain gaming and Esports company, is pleased to announce a partnership with Centralex Exchange, resulting in a token listing of the Company’s CHAIN gaming token, as well as an airdrop of CENX tokens to all existing CHAIN stakers.   

With the Centralex partnership, Chain Games’ players will be able to conveniently exchange fiat and crypto for CHAIN tokens for the purposes of playing games, thereby expanding the Company’s crypto and fiat footprint. Players will be able to buy and sell CHAIN tokens directly on the Centralex exchange platform using crypto, bank transfers or bank cards, and with on-ramp methods including Visa, Mastercard, SEPA and more. The partnership improves the accessibility of crypto to savvy and novice players helping accelerate wider adoption of Chain Games’ online Esports platform.

In addition to the Centralex listing, all current CHAIN stakers as of May 17th, 11:59:59PM UTC, will receive a weighted airdrop of CENX tokens equivalent to 2% of the total CENX supply.  The date of the airdrop will commence one week after the listing of the CHAIN token on the Centralex Exchange platform.

Chain Games’ CEO, Adam Barlam explains that “One of the biggest user pain points in blockchain gaming and crypto in general, is buying CHAIN tokens or any tokens with fiat or crypto, and Centralex helps reduce the barriers for global competitive gamers.  Crypto and fiat on and off-ramps will play an important role in the scaling and adoption of our gaming platform, and the partnership with Centralex will help us to generate broader access to various players with differing familiarity with crypto.”

Centralex CEO, Tristan Roozendaal explains that “We at Centralex have a very strong foundation of ex-bankers and crypto fanatics. Centralex is a fully regulated Estonian exchange, and uses the latest wallet technologies to safeguard clients’ funds via “FireBlocks”, our wallet service provider offering Custo-DeFi solutions.  We are excited to extend this functionality to the Chain Games community and new and existing token holders and gamers!” 

About Centralex

Centralex is an international fully regulated Estonian cryptocurrency exchange . With a global vision in mind and an international office footprint spanning two continents, Centralex strives to bring remarkable people together to do extraordinary things.

To contact Centralex:
Website: https://centralex.com/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/CentraleX_hk
Telegram: https://t.me/centralexhk
Email: media@centralex.io

About Chain Games

Chain Games is a blockchain enabled gaming platform designed to allow competitive Esports competitions on a non-custodial, decentralized platform governed by an Ethereum Smart Contract.  

To contact Chain Games:
Website: ./../../../index.html
